version_description: Bug fixes and performance improvement
Bug fix and improvements
Bug Fixes and Improvements.

The new Soompi App is here! We are excited to invite you to try out our new Soompi app built from the ground up, with smooth experience, brand new colour and friendly design. You can now follow a celebrity and find out all the articles about him or her. You can like an article, bookmark it or share it. You can create an account and decorate your profile page with the images of your fandom.
Stay tuned. More functions are coming! Let us know what you think! We look forward to hearing from you!

- Fix crash issue when saving image in an article
- UI fixes and improvements
- Fix article tag not responding in some case

- Add comments and replies after articles
- Add sticky reaction bar at bottom of article
- Fix article content not appearing at all when it has youtube iframe
- Fix crash on some comments

- Add sorting ability to fan club list
- Improve overall commenting experience
- Fix crash issue when tapping some links inside an article
- Other fixes and improvements

- Fix some article got cut off bug
- Other improvements
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Fix broken URL handling from push notification and deep link in some cases

- Add Spanish language support. (You can switch language back and forth in Settings.)
- Fix wrong comment time
- Other improvements

- Added Spanish language support (You can switch language back and forth in Settings.)
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Support video in article

- Support video in article
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Add dynamic type support. You can read in larger/smaller font sizes.
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Fix a crash when opening some URLs
- Fix issues on iOS 13

- Fix some issues in dark mode
- Other bug fixes

- Fix an issue that news article may get cut off at the end
- Fix an issue that bookmark button in article page may not work

- You can now log in to Soompi using your Apple ID via "Sign In with Apple"
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Fix an issue related to navigation bar behavior
- Fix a bug where the Join button in the fan club search list does not update sometimes
- Other bug fixes and improvements
